dataset_id: ABoVE: Cumulative Annual Burned Area, Circumpolar High Northern Latitudes, 2001-2015
title: ABoVE: Cumulative Annual Burned Area, Circumpolar High Northern Latitudes, 2001-2015
summary: This dataset provides annual cumulative end-of-season burned area in circumpolar high northern latitudes (HNL) above 60 degrees for the years 2001-2015. The data were generated using the Arctic Boreal Burned Area (ABBA) product (a MODIS-based algorithm). The product is delivered in two spatial domains: circumpolar and a North American subset for areas above 60 degree north.
